constraints.name: permutation_constraint
constraints.description: 给定的序列是一个排列，即包含从1到n的所有整数且每个整数恰好出现一次
constraints.formal: p 是一个排列，即 p[i] ∈ [1, n] 且所有 p[i] 互不相同

constraints.name: sum_constraint
constraints.description: 目标是找到一个排列 q，使得其权重最小。权重定义为 |q_1 - p_{q_2}| + |q_2 - p_{q_3}| + ... + |q_{n-1} - p_{q_n}| + |q_n - p_{q_1}| 的和最小
constraints.formal: minimize Σ |q_i - p_{q_{i+1}}| for i = 1 to n-1 and |q_n - p_{q_1}|

constraints.name: lexicographical_order
constraints.description: 在所有具有最小权重的排列中，选择字典序最小的排列
constraints.formal: among all permutations with minimum weight, choose the lexicographically smallest one
